region: # あるあさ、めざめるとせかいは<$0A>いっぺんしていた！

text: One morning I woke up and the world\nhad totally changed!
Hammer secretly self-published\nan autobiography
called "The Naked Hammer\n(The world that can't understand me
is just lame)" and\ndistributed it all over town.
(Mostly posted on pillars\nnear the school gates
along with yellow boxes.)
There were surprisingly quite a few\npeople with too much free time.
Some of them actually\nread that shady book!!
Seeing Hammer's raw
Those bored folks lost their\nsense of reality - total madness!
They began to revere Hammer\nas their master.
The bored masses\nturned into hopeless losers.
Through a powerful loser\nnetwork
they started passing it around
…became a society of losers\nwho saw Hammer as their guru!!
Hammer
The way he let it all go to his\nhead
bigger than anything at the time!!
At this rate
This is the story of the heroes\nwho rose up to return the world
to its normal
column12: peaceful state…\na tale of their journey.
